name: Aryaduta Bandung
detail: I already try to stay in saveral hotels in Bandung. But, Aryaduta Hotel is the best hotel I ever stay in Bandung. Room was spacious, food is delicious. Clean. Strategic area. Walk away in the city. Mall is just next door, and I really appreciates to the staffs. They work so responsive, friendly, and superb. Once I got the unclean and untidy room, but they solved the problem very fast and make me satisfied with their responsibility and they always make sure that the guest will be enjoy and comfort to stay. I like the gym, sauna, and the pool. Their barbeque area also very nice. I always stay in this hotel for business trip or family trip. Also, during romantic time with my love one. I recommend this hotel with all my heart!!! )))

name: The Papandayan Hotel
detail: It was really really good. As mentioned, hospitality was unmatched by any other hotel I've ever stayed in. The hotel staff went to the best of their ability to tend to our needs. We managed to have the relaxing holiday we wanted. Transport infrastructure within bandung is a huge challenge. Angkots are mostly for the locals as they are familiar with the routes, no trains or teams around, and few taxis available. We had to hire a car for the day or book a taxi, of which it took at least 20 min wait each time. However the staff made it much easier for us by helping us with these difficulties. The concierge, Agust, even ran after us as we walked towards out taxi to the airport and presented us an elephant soft toy each, thanking us for our stay and welcoming us to stay with them again. It was simply fantastic. We had a great time. Thank you Papandayan hotel!
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: The Luxton Hotel
detail: I had a wonderful stay at The Luxton. The breakfast was excellent. The room is very clean n comfortable. My kids enjoyed swimming eventhough it rained evryday bec of the indoor swimming pool. My kids love the kids club. The only thing that need improvement is the parking area which is too small. But tht's not a big problem coz thy provide free vallet parking which is very helpful. This will be one of my favourite hotel in Bandung.

name: Janevalla Bandung
detail: Not only the unique exterior, but this hotel serves the best service and f&b. For superior room, the room is very clean and spacious. No big difference with the deluxe room so either way both room are great. Another reason to stay is because this hotel has 24hr staying regulation, it suits for business travel or if you have late check in you donâ€™t need to leave the hotel then next afternoon at 12, but instead you can stay until 11pm at night so you will have enough time to rest or pack without rush. This is gonna be our #1 hotel in Bandung.

name: Hilton Bandung
detail: Hilton hotel is located strategically near the city centre.

name: THE 1O1 Bandung Dago Hotel
detail: This is one hotel in Bandung that I will return to. We got a free upgrade thanks to the staff u knew that we are on a honeymoon. They were very helpful, especially Ricky (supervisor). He helped us arrange our transport and even sit and hang with us a little to introduce the hotel and himself. Other front desk staff we helpful as well, they recommended places where locals shop and dine. The rooms are awesome and spacious enough for us and the location of the hotel is just right for travelers who wish to shop in th city.

name: ARTOTEL Suites Aquila - Bandung
detail: it's nice time to spend it in this hotel with my family bu i have two points: 5 star hotel without gym??? this is not 5 star hotel. every order under room you need to pay it cash?? this is not acceptable!!! they need to solve above two issues to be one of the best hotel in bandung.

name: Golden Flower Hotel
detail: Together with my wife, I have been a frequent traveller in Asia for over 40 years usually staying in 4 star hotels booked through Agoda. In February 2013 we stayed at the Golden Flower Hotel Bandung for 8 days. I choose this hotel by reading Agoda reviews. I only book my hotel through Agoda because I get a better room and service and also because I prefer to pay by paypal. For once my wife and I agree on something ...Golden Flower Hotel is out of this world both in terms of service and friendliness. The buffet breakfast is excellent,changing daily with an extensive menu. The restaurant is also excellent ... top quality food, professionally cooked the way it should be. The service is slick, friendly and second to none. Good swimming pool, gym and hotel security are top top notch...rooms are big and spotlessly clean. In over 40 years of Asian travel I have not met nicer people than the people of Bandung and staff at Golden Flower Hotel. On the downside, although the hotel is well located the immediate environment is rundown and shabby but I did not find it objectionable. In conclusion, The Golden Flower Hotel is out of this world.
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: Favehotel Hyper Square
detail: The hotel is conveniently located near the Bandung Airport. Just a short stroll you can get into one of the biggest foodcourt in Bandung, Paskal Hypersquare Foodmarket. Other than that, the free water dispenser on every floor helps a lot for u to drink in the hotel all the time without worrying running out of water and was afraid charged by expensive minibar :) Tips: I didn't book the room with breakfast, pay on the spot will be IDR80K per pax. If possible, choose the room facing the empty field/parking area, very much quieter than the other side.
area: Bandung City Center,Bandung - View on map

name: Holiday Inn Bandung Pasteur By IHG
detail: We booked a few rooms as we were going as a large family, and had a great overall experience. Rooms were nicely furnished, had everything we needed and service was exceptional. Check-in was smooth and quick, and we enjoyed our stay here. The hotel is located in an area with lots of street food and restaurants (I recommend the grilled banana at a kiosk opposite the hotel, as well as chicken porridge that's great for breakfast, also opposite the hotel), and also has a great view of Tangkuban Perahu and depending on which room you get, you may also be able to see planes landing and taking off at the nearby airport. Would recommend this to other travellers and would return if I visit Bandung again.
